author: Staff Reporter
text:
Chennai Metro Rail’s contractor Transtonnelstroy-Afcons was given the ‘Greentech Environment Award 2015 (silver)’ by Greentech Foundation for maintaining environmental standards, according to a press release.

About 66,000 saplings had been planted by them in and around the city, the release said.

They planted 25 saplings for each tree that was cut down for work, it added.

—staff reporter
title: CMRL’s contractor bags green award
